trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo" /> class represents a signer associated with a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms" /> object that represents a CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo" /> 类表示一个签名者，该签名者与表示 CMS/PKCS #7 消息的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms" /> 对象相关联。

trans-unit.source: The signatures represented by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo> class can be either over message content or a signature.
trans-unit.target: 所表示的签名<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo>类可以是通过消息内容或签名。

trans-unit.source: The latter kind of signature is referred to as a *countersignature*.
trans-unit.target: 后一种签名称为*副署*。

trans-unit.source: This implementation of CMS/PKCS #7 supports only one level of countersignature.
trans-unit.target: 此实现的 CMS/PKCS #7 仅支持一个级别的副署。

trans-unit.source: That is, a signature can be signed, which forms a countersignature, but that countersignature cannot be signed again.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，可以签名的签名，形成副署，但不能重新签署该副署。

trans-unit.source: This class does not have a public constructor; therefore, it cannot be publicly instantiated.
trans-unit.target: 此类没有公共构造函数;因此，它不能公开实例化。

trans-unit.source: It is a read-only class accessible from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.SignerInfos%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 它是只读的类可从访问<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.SignerInfos%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.Certificate" /> property retrieves the signing certificate associated with the signer information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.Certificate" /> 属性检索与该签名者信息关联的签名证书。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> object that represents the signing certificate.
trans-unit.target: 表示签名证书的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: If the signing certificate is not included at signing time by using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.IncludeOption%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, then the certificate will not be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果签名的证书不包括在签名时使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.IncludeOption%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>不会返回属性，则该证书。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.CheckHash" /> method verifies the data integrity of the CMS/PKCS #7 message signer information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.CheckHash" /> 方法验证 CMS/PKCS #7 消息签名者信息的数据完整性。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.CheckHash" /> is a specialized method used in specific security infrastructure applications in which the subject uses the **HashOnly** member of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType" /> enumeration when setting up a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.CheckHash" /> 是一个专用方法，用于特定的安全基础结构应用程序。在这些应用程序中，在设置 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner" /> 对象时，使用者使用 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType" /> 枚举的 HashOnly 成员。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.CheckHash" /> does not authenticate the signer information because this method does not involve verifying a digital signature.
trans-unit.target: 由于 <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.CheckHash" /> 方法并不涉及对数字签名进行验证，因此该方法不对签名者信息进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: For general-purpose checking of the integrity and authenticity of CMS/PKCS #7 message signer information and countersignatures, use the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.CheckSignature(System.Boolean)" /> or <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.CheckSignature(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection,System.Boolean)" /> methods.
trans-unit.target: 要对 CMS/PKCS #7 消息签名者信息和副署的完整性和可靠性进行通用检查，请使用 <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.CheckSignature(System.Boolean)" /> 或 <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.CheckSignature(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection,System.Boolean)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: This method does not provide authentication of the CMS/PKCS #7 message signer information.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不提供身份验证的 CMS/PKCS #7 消息签署人的信息。

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic operation could not be completed.
trans-unit.target: 未能完成加密操作。

trans-unit.source: Verifies the digital signature of the message.
trans-unit.target: 验证消息的数字签名。

trans-unit.source: A bool value that specifies whether only the digital signature is verified.
trans-unit.target: 一个指定是否仅验证数字签名的布尔值。

trans-unit.source: If <c>verifySignatureOnly</c> is <see langword="true" />, only the signature is verified.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>verifySignatureOnly</c> 为 <see langword="true" />，则只验证签名。

trans-unit.source: If <c>verifySignatureOnly</c> is <see langword="false" />, the digital signature is verified, the certificate chain is validated, and the purposes of the certificates are validated.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>verifySignatureOnly</c> 为 <see langword="false" />，则将对数字签名、证书链和证书的用途进行验证。

trans-unit.source: The purposes of the certificate are considered valid if the certificate has no key usage or if the key usage supports digital signature or nonrepudiation.
trans-unit.target: 如果证书没有密钥用法或如果密钥用法支持数字签名或认可，则认为该证书的用途有效。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.CheckSignature(System.Boolean)" /> method verifies the digital signature of the message and, optionally, validates the certificate.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.CheckSignature(System.Boolean)" /> 方法对消息的数字签名进行验证，并对证书进行验证（可选）。

trans-unit.source: This method throws an exception if the verification of the digital signature fails or any validation requirements are not met.
trans-unit.target: 如果数字签名验证失败或不满足任何验证要求，此方法将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: If more complex validation is required, the caller can specify that only the signature is verified and then use an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain> object to perform custom validation.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要更复杂的验证，调用方可以指定仅对签名进行验证，然后使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain>对象来执行自定义验证。

trans-unit.source: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
trans-unit.target: 向不接受空引用作为有效参数的方法传递了一个空引用。

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic operation could not be completed.
trans-unit.target: 未能完成加密操作。

trans-unit.source: A method call was invalid for the object's current state.
trans-unit.target: 一个方法调用对于对象的当前状态无效。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> object that can be used to validate the chain.
trans-unit.target: 可用于验证链的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: If no additional certificates are to be used to validate the chain, use <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.CheckSignature(System.Boolean)" /> instead of <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.CheckSignature(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection,System.Boolean)" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有其他要用于验证链的证书，则应使用 <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.CheckSignature(System.Boolean)" /> 而不应使用 <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.CheckSignature(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection,System.Boolean)" />。

trans-unit.source: A bool value that specifies whether only the digital signature is verified.
trans-unit.target: 一个指定是否仅验证数字签名的布尔值。

trans-unit.source: If <c>verifySignatureOnly</c> is <see langword="true" />, only the signature is verified.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>verifySignatureOnly</c> 为 <see langword="true" />，则只验证签名。

trans-unit.source: If <c>verifySignatureOnly</c> is <see langword="false" />, the digital signature is verified, the certificate chain is validated, and the purposes of the certificates are validated.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>verifySignatureOnly</c> 为 <see langword="false" />，则将对数字签名、证书链和证书的用途进行验证。

trans-unit.source: The purposes of the certificate are considered valid if the certificate has no key usage or if the key usage supports digital signature or nonrepudiation.
trans-unit.target: 如果证书没有密钥用法或如果密钥用法支持数字签名或认可，则认为该证书的用途有效。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.CheckSignature(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection,System.Boolean)" /> method verifies the digital signature of the message by using the specified collection of certificates and, optionally, validates the certificate.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.CheckSignature(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection,System.Boolean)" /> 方法通过使用指定的证书集合对消息的数字签名进行验证，并对证书进行验证（可选）。

trans-unit.source: This method throws an exception if the verification of the digital signature fails or any validation requirements are not met.
trans-unit.target: 如果数字签名验证失败或不满足任何验证要求，此方法将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: If more complex validation is required, the caller can specify that only the signature is verified and then use an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain> object to perform custom validation.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要更复杂的验证，调用方可以指定仅对签名进行验证，然后使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain>对象来执行自定义验证。

trans-unit.source: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
trans-unit.target: 向不接受空引用作为有效参数的方法传递了一个空引用。

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic operation could not be completed.
trans-unit.target: 未能完成加密操作。

trans-unit.source: A method call was invalid for the object's current state.
trans-unit.target: 一个方法调用对于对象的当前状态无效。

trans-unit.source: Creates a countersignature and adds the signature to the CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: 创建副署并将签名添加到 CMS/PKCS #7 消息。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.ComputeCounterSignature" /> method prompts the user to select a signing certificate, creates a countersignature, and adds the signature to the CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.ComputeCounterSignature" /> 方法提示用户选择签名证书、创建副署并向 CMS/PKCS #7 消息添加签名。

trans-unit.source: Countersignatures are restricted to one level.
trans-unit.target: 副署限制为一层。

trans-unit.source: This implementation of CMS/PKCS #7 supports only one level of countersignature.
trans-unit.target: 此实现的 CMS/PKCS #7 仅支持一个级别的副署。

trans-unit.source: That is, a signature can be signed, which forms a countersignature, but that countersignature cannot be signed again.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，可以签名的签名，形成副署，但不能重新签署该副署。

trans-unit.source: This method displays a user interface in which you choose signers for this message.
trans-unit.target: 此方法会显示在其中选择为此消息的签名者的用户界面。

trans-unit.source: This requires that the current process is running in *user interactive mode*, meaning that the <xref:System.Environment.UserInteractive%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 这要求当前进程是否正在*用户交互模式*，这意味着，<xref:System.Environment.UserInteractive%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: A process is normally in user interactive mode unless it is a service process or running inside a Web application.
trans-unit.target: 进程在用户交互模式中处于正常情况下，除非它为服务进程或在 Web 应用程序内部运行。

trans-unit.source: Signers whose certificates meet the following conditions will be displayed in the list:
trans-unit.target: 签名者的证书满足以下条件将显示在列表中：

trans-unit.source: The certificate has an associated private key.
trans-unit.target: 该证书具有关联的私钥。

trans-unit.source: The certificate is within its validity period.
trans-unit.target: 该证书将在其有效期内。

trans-unit.source: The certificate has no key usage or a key usage that supports digital signatures or nonrepudiation.
trans-unit.target: 该证书具有没有密钥用法或支持数字签名或不可否认性的密钥用法。

trans-unit.source: Signer certificates are chosen from the My store.
trans-unit.target: 签名者的证书选择从 My 存储区。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: The following permissions are required to display the user interface:
trans-unit.target: 需要以下权限来显示用户界面：

trans-unit.source: The following permissions are required to access the signature key:
trans-unit.target: 访问的签名密钥所需的以下权限：

trans-unit.source: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
trans-unit.target: 向不接受空引用作为有效参数的方法传递了一个空引用。

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic operation could not be completed.
trans-unit.target: 未能完成加密操作。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner" /> object that represents the counter signer.
trans-unit.target: 表示副署签名者的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.ComputeCounterSignature(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner)" /> method creates a countersignature by using the specified signer and adds the signature to the CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.ComputeCounterSignature(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner)" /> 方法通过使用指定的签名者创建副署并将签名添加到 CMS/PKCS #7 消息。

trans-unit.source: Countersignatures are restricted to one level.
trans-unit.target: 副署限制为一层。

trans-unit.source: This implementation of CMS/PKCS #7 supports only one level of countersignature.
trans-unit.target: 此实现的 CMS/PKCS #7 仅支持一个级别的副署。

trans-unit.source: That is, a signature can be signed, which forms a countersignature, but that countersignature cannot be signed again.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，可以签名的签名，形成副署，但不能重新签署该副署。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: The following permissions are required to access the signature key:
trans-unit.target: 访问的签名密钥所需的以下权限：

trans-unit.source: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
trans-unit.target: 向不接受空引用作为有效参数的方法传递了一个空引用。

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic operation could not be completed.
trans-unit.target: 未能完成加密操作。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.CounterSignerInfos" /> property retrieves the set of counter signers associated with the signer information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.CounterSignerInfos" /> 属性检索与该签名者信息关联的一组副署签名者。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfoCollection" /> collection that represents the counter signers for the signer information.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfoCollection" /> 集合，表示该签名者信息的副署签名者。

trans-unit.source: If there are no counter signers, the property is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有副署签名者，则此属性为空集合。

trans-unit.source: This implementation of CMS/PKCS #7 supports only one level of countersignature.
trans-unit.target: 此实现的 CMS/PKCS #7 仅支持一个级别的副署。

trans-unit.source: That is, a signature can be signed, which forms a countersignature, but that countersignature cannot be signed again.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，可以签名的签名，形成副署，但不能重新签署该副署。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.DigestAlgorithm" /> property retrieves the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" /> object that represents the hash algorithm used in the computation of the signatures.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.DigestAlgorithm" /> 属性检索表示用于计算签名的哈希算法的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" /> object that represents the hash algorithm used with the signature.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" /> 对象，表示用于计算签名的哈希算法。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified countersignature from the <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.CounterSignerInfos" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.CounterSignerInfos" /> 集合中移除指定的副署。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the countersignature to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的副署的索引（从零开始）。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.RemoveCounterSignature(System.Int32)" /> method removes the countersignature at the specified index of the <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.CounterSignerInfos" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.RemoveCounterSignature(System.Int32)" /> 方法移除 <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.CounterSignerInfos" /> 集合中指定索引处的副署。

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic operation could not be completed.
trans-unit.target: 未能完成加密操作。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo" /> object that represents the countersignature being removed.
trans-unit.target: 表示被移除的副署的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.RemoveCounterSignature(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo)" /> method removes the countersignature for the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.RemoveCounterSignature(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo)" /> 方法移除指定 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo" /> 对象的副署。

trans-unit.source: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
trans-unit.target: 向不接受空引用作为有效参数的方法传递了一个空引用。

trans-unit.source: The value of an argument was outside the allowable range of values as defined by the called method.
trans-unit.target: 参数值超出了被调用方法定义的允许值范围。

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic operation could not be completed.
trans-unit.target: 未能完成加密操作。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.SignedAttributes" /> property retrieves the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection" /> collection of signed attributes that is associated with the signer information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.SignedAttributes" /> 属性检索与该签名者信息关联的已签名特性的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: Signed attributes are signed along with the rest of the message content.
trans-unit.target: 已签名特性与其余的消息内容一起进行签名。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection" /> collection that represents the signed attributes.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示已签名特性的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: If there are no signed attributes, the property is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有已签名特性，则该属性为空集合。

trans-unit.source: An example of a signed attribute that might be included in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection> collection retrieved by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.SignedAttributes%2A> property is the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime> signing time attribute.
trans-unit.target: 可能包括在签名属性示例<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection>集合检索<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.SignedAttributes%2A>属性是<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime>签名时间属性。

trans-unit.source: Signed attributes are signed along with the rest of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms> message content.
trans-unit.target: 签名的特性进行签名的其余部分的<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms>消息内容。

trans-unit.source: This means that a party that successfully verifies the signature can have confidence that the contents of these attributes are authentic and have not been altered.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着，已成功验证签名的当事方可以确信的这些特性的内容可信的且未更改。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9ContentType> object and a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9MessageDigest> object will be automatically generated and placed in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.SignedAttributes%2A> property whenever the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.SignedAttributes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property for the corresponding signer is not empty.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9ContentType>对象和一个<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9MessageDigest>对象将自动生成并放入<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.SignedAttributes%2A>属性每当<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.SignedAttributes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>相应签名者的属性不为空。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.SignerIdentifier" /> property retrieves the certificate identifier of the signer associated with the signer information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.SignerIdentifier" /> 属性检索与该签名者信息关联的签名者的证书标识符。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifier" /> object that uniquely identifies the certificate associated with the signer information.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifier" /> 对象，此对象唯一地标识与该签名者信息关联的证书。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.UnsignedAttributes" /> property retrieves the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection" /> collection of unsigned attributes that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo" /> content.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.UnsignedAttributes" /> 属性检索与 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection" /> 内容关联的未签名特性的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: Unsigned attributes can be modified without invalidating the signature.
trans-unit.target: 可对未签名特性进行修改，这不会导致签名无效。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection" /> collection that represents the unsigned attributes.
trans-unit.target: 表示未签名特性的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: If there are no unsigned attributes, the property is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有未签名特性，则该属性为空集合。

trans-unit.source: Unsigned attributes are not signed along with the rest of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms> message content.
trans-unit.target: 无符号的属性未签名的其余部分的<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms>消息内容。

trans-unit.source: Even though a party successfully verifies the signature, the unsigned attributes may have been altered and should not be considered to have authenticity or integrity.
trans-unit.target: 即使当事方成功验证签名，未签名的特性将未修改，并且不应视为具有可靠性或完整性。

trans-unit.source: An example of an unsigned attribute that might be included in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection> collection retrieved by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.UnsignedAttributes%2A> property is a countersignature.
trans-unit.target: 可能包括在无符号属性示例<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection>集合检索<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.UnsignedAttributes%2A>属性是一个副署。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.Version" /> property retrieves the signer information version.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.Version" /> 属性检索签名者信息版本。

trans-unit.source: An int value that specifies the signer information version.
trans-unit.target: 指定签名者信息版本的整数值。

trans-unit.source: The version determines whether the message is a PKCS #7 message or a Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS) message.
trans-unit.target: 版本确定消息是否是 PKCS #7 消息或加密消息语法 (CMS) 的消息。

trans-unit.source: CMS is a newer superset of PKCS #7.
trans-unit.target: CMS 是 PKCS #7 的较新超集。
